title: Loving free speech, until it doesn't suit him.
Labelling people as "pedos" when he doesn't get his way.
Again, when not getting his way, he lied that the UK government was 'releasing convicted pedophiles in order to imprison people for social media posts'.
Suing advertisers for not wanting to advertise on X.
Doing some Nazi style "throwing my heart out to you" salutes at Donald Trump's Presidential Inauguration.
Getting angered by Wikipedia for publishing facts (again) about said Nazi style salutes.
Revising history about the Nazi's ideology with the far right in Germany.
Account boosting in multiple video games.
Insulting an International Space Station commander after Musk lied about "stranded" astronauts.
